name: Trainer
description: A person who trains pokemon for league battles.

name: Pokemon
description: Creatures of all shapes and sizes who live in the wild or with their trainers.

name: Pokemon Types
description: Bug, Dark, Dragon, Electric, Fairy, Fighting, Fire, Flying, Ghost, Grass, Ground, Ice, Normal, Poison, Psychic, Rock, Steel, Water

name: Pokeball
description: The device that is used to catch pokemon.
